sentences.sContent: Her boy has never been to a doctor or a dentist, and last bathed when he was 2, so a sweatshop job by comparison would be far more pleasant and less dangerous.
sentences.sContent_eng: Her boy has never been to a doctor or a dentist, and last bathed when he was 2, so a sweatshop job by comparison would be far more pleasant and less dangerous.
sentences.sCn: 他的儿子从来没看过医生或者牙医，最后一次洗澡是在2岁的时候，所以两相对照，血汗工厂的工作将会开心的并且没有那么危险。

trans.tranCn: 血汗工厂(指工人劳动条件差,工作时间长,工资低的工场或工厂)
trans.tranOther: a small business, factory etc where people work hard in bad conditions for very little money – used to show disapproval
